sentences.en: Many workers are seduced by rosy illusions of as a telecommuter.
sentences.cn: 许多工作者被电子交通的美好幻想所迷惑.

sentences.en: Many workers are seduced by rosy illusions of life as a telecommuter.
sentences.cn: 许多工被电子交通的美好幻想所迷惑.

sentences.en: Remote Accelerator is aimed at single users, and has many features aimed at the telecommuter.
sentences.cn: 远程加速器定位于独立用户，针对远程工作人员提供了许多功能。

trans.tran_cn: （在家通过电话和电脑与共事者联系的）远距离工作者
trans.tran_en: someone who works at home using a computer connected to a company’s main office
